items.sentence: Tom can't see very well without his glasses.
Tom came over last night to study with Mary.

Tom asked me how many countries I'd visited.
Tom asked Mary what her sisters' names were.
Tom asked Mary to tell him where she'd been.
Tom asked Mary to find out what John wanted.
Tom asked Mary if she could give him a ride.
Tom and Mary wanted to watch the same movie.
Tom and Mary used to often do that together.
Tom and Mary have both spent time in prison.
Tom and Mary both fell and broke their arms.
My uncle gave me a friendly piece of advice.
I think it's good for you to read this book.
I had planned to visit the temple last week.

I took off my sweater because it got warmer.
Many clients come to that lawyer for advice.
Can you call me back when you have a chance?
Can you really stay in Australia all summer?
